name: test_valid_sending_inscriptions_zero_wallet
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Expected error message 'Balance not enough to pay network fee.', but got 'Insufficient balance. Non-Inscription balance (0 BEL) is lower than 0.0000522 BEL'
assert 'Balance not enough to pay network fee.' in 'Insufficient balance. Non-Inscription balance (0 BEL) is lower than 0.0000522 BEL'
statusTrace:
driver = <selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver (session="637b5f2fa6406b1b60f9103a3c9c8d6a")>

    @pytest.mark.usefixtures("driver")
    @allure.feature("Verification of sending inscription from a wallet without a balance")
    def test_valid_sending_inscriptions_zero_wallet(driver):
    
        # Private key authentication
        ex_id, password = restore_zero_balance_wallet(driver)
    
        change_network = ManePage(driver)
    
        change_network.change_network(ex_id) # change network to Testnet
        change_network.get_balance()
    
        change_network.account_address_btn()
        change_network.nft_page_btn()
    
        nft_page = SendInscription(driver)
    
        nft_page.select_inscription()
        nft_page.return_id_card()
    
        nft_page.send_btn()
    
        nft_page.enter_address(Data.VALID_ADDRESS_FOR_CHECK)
        nft_page.continue_btn()
    
        time.sleep(0.3)
        error_message = driver.find_element(By.XPATH, "//div[contains(@class, 'toast ')]")
        assert error_message.is_displayed(), "Expected an error, but no error was displayed."
    
        error_text = error_message.text
    
        allure.attach(f"Error message: {error_text}", name="Error Message", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)
    
        expected_error = "Balance not enough to pay network fee."
>       assert expected_error in error_text, f"Expected error message '{expected_error}', but got '{error_text}'"
E       AssertionError: Expected error message 'Balance not enough to pay network fee.', but got 'Insufficient balance. Non-Inscription balance (0 BEL) is lower than 0.0000522 BEL'
E       assert 'Balance not enough to pay network fee.' in 'Insufficient balance. Non-Inscription balance (0 BEL) is lower than 0.0000522 BEL'
